name: ROBOT IN DEBT
description:
This artwork illustrating a robot in debt who restrained and can’t easily move or disturbed with his debt.

“Lifestyle sometimes force us to own what we shouldn’t ready to own it.

Fooling ourselves to let the debt restraint our freedom in order to fulfil our desire which shouldn’t always be followed actually.

when you want to buy something it is not measured by how desire you are, but how much benefit will be generated in having it. “

digitally hand drawn and animated
GIF
2000 x 2000 px
